In this section we will create a table with the demographics of the participants in the study. 



```{r}

participants |> 
  select(-c("pid", "dropout_time"))  |> 
  tbl_summary(
    by = arm, 
    type = 
      list(
        nb_partner_pastmonth ~ "continuous", 
        nb_partner_life ~ "continuous"
      )
  )  |>
  add_p(include = -c("site")) 

```
